message: ده مشروع ورقة بحثية انا شغال عليه و اللابتوب اتسرق، شوفوا اللينك :)
story: Mohamed Osman shared a link to the group: Egyptian Geeks.
name: Click here to support Research Paper Support by Mohamed Osman
caption: www.gofundme.com
description: Summary: Help me raise money to buy a new laptop instead of my stolen one to meet the deadline for submitting my first scientific paper ever, which will introduce a new way of interacting with computers! My Story Hello, my name is Mohamed (Mo), I came to Paris to pursue my master degree.  I am cu...

data.message:
As a phd student, I understand the pressure of submitting papers. Hope you can purchase a laptop soon isA. I have some tips though:
1- do you have to run experiments or just writing? In the second case, you can use writelatex or the like. 
2- can't your professor support you? Do you consider student loans as well? To me, this is an exceptional case, and the university/professor should consider helping you.
3- don't you have a computer in your lab? Or in the library? 
Hope you figure this out soon. Good luck.

1- Since it is an interaction paper, a lot of experiments and evaluation needs to be done on the system. 
2- the professor is only a (paper) supervisor, and I am currently in contact with the university and the master program to figure if they can help me
3- Yes, but the university (outside Paris) is 2 hours away from where I live, I only go there to follow up with the professor, and it will be a waste of time to go there everyday. Currently I borrowed a laptop from a friend, but it wont last long before he takes it back.
Thanks a lot
